title: "Bosch, Highmark Health unveil AI audio for health care"
excerpt: "An audio artificial intelligence device designed by Bosch and used on the International Space Station is being pioneered in #Pittsburgh by Highmark Health and Allegheny Health Network to help detect childhood asthma and other medical conditions."

    excerpt: "The study will begin on a small cohort of pediatric patients at Allegheny Health Network in the first quarter of this year. Microphones will collect audio data that will be analyzed using AI and machine learning."
